description: This file defines a bottom navigation system for a Flutter application, including a controller class 'BottomNavController' for managing tab state and a widget 'OceanBottomNavBar' for rendering a bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Dashboard, Consult, Records, and Profile.

classes.name: BottomNavController
classes.description: Manages the selected tab index and notifies listeners when it changes.

classes.name: OceanBottomNavBar
classes.description: A stateless widget that renders a bottom navigation bar with four specific tabs.

methods.name: setIndex
methods.description: Sets the current tab index and notifies listeners if the index changes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the bottom navigation bar widget with specified destinations.
